Librarian's Compass.name: Librarian's Compass
Librarian's Compass.bonus: Earn a +20 Ink Drop bonus for any book by a new-to-you author.
Librarian's Compass.passiveBonus: Earn a +10 Ink Drop bonus for any book by a new-to-you author (passive).

Amulet of Duality.name: Amulet of Duality
Amulet of Duality.bonus: Earn a +15 Ink Drop bonus on books with multiple points of view or multiple narrators.
Amulet of Duality.passiveBonus: Earn a +7 Ink Drop bonus on books with multiple POVs (passive).

Scatter Brain Scarab.name: Scatter Brain Scarab
Scatter Brain Scarab.bonus: When equipped, gain a x3 Ink Drop bonus for reading three books at the same time.
Scatter Brain Scarab.passiveBonus: Gain a x1.5 Ink Drop bonus for reading multiple books (passive).

Cloak of the Story-Weaver.name: Cloak of the Story-Weaver
Cloak of the Story-Weaver.bonus: Earn a permanent +10 Ink Drop bonus for books that are part of a series.
Cloak of the Story-Weaver.passiveBonus: Earn a +5 Ink Drop bonus for series books (passive).

Blood Fury Tattoo.name: Blood Fury Tattoo
Blood Fury Tattoo.bonus: Earn a +15 Ink Drop bonus for your next book in a series.
Blood Fury Tattoo.passiveBonus: Earn a +7 Ink Drop bonus for series continuations (passive).

The Bookwyrm's Scale.name: The Bookwyrm's Scale
The Bookwyrm's Scale.bonus: For every book over 500 pages, gain a +10 Ink Drop bonus.
The Bookwyrm's Scale.passiveBonus: Gain a +5 Ink Drop bonus for books over 500 pages (passive).

Key of the Archive.name: Key of the Archive
Key of the Archive.bonus: Earn a +15 Ink Drop bonus on books where something is unlocked, either literally or figuratively.
Key of the Archive.passiveBonus: Earn a +7 Ink Drop bonus on unlock-themed books (passive).

Tome of Potential.name: Tome of Potential
Tome of Potential.bonus: Earn a x3 Ink Drop bonus for books over 400 pages.
Tome of Potential.passiveBonus: Earn a x1.5 Ink Drop bonus for books over 400 pages (passive).

Librarian's Quill.name: Librarian's Quill
Librarian's Quill.bonus: Earn a permanent +2 Paper Scraps bonus for every book you journal about after finishing.

Chalice of Restoration.name: Chalice of Restoration
Chalice of Restoration.bonus: Once per month, you may use this item to remove a Worn Page penalty.
Chalice of Restoration.passiveBonus: Once every 2 months, you may use this item to remove a Worn Page penalty (passive).

Lantern of Foresight.name: Lantern of Foresight
Lantern of Foresight.bonus: Once per month, you may re-roll a prompt or a die roll to get a new result, and you must keep the new result.
Lantern of Foresight.passiveBonus: Once every 2 months, you may re-roll a prompt or a die roll (passive).

The Scepter of Knowledge.name: The Scepter of Knowledge
The Scepter of Knowledge.bonus: Once per month, you may switch the genre of any quest you roll to Non-Fiction.
The Scepter of Knowledge.passiveBonus: Once every 2 months, you may switch any quest to Non-Fiction (passive).

Gilded Painting.name: Gilded Painting
Gilded Painting.bonus: Earn +2 Ink Drops when reading in an ornate location.
Gilded Painting.passiveBonus: Earn +1 Ink Drop for reading in ornate locations (passive).

Celestial Koi Fish.name: Celestial Koi Fish
Celestial Koi Fish.bonus: Once per month, you may use this familiar's insight to switch a genre-based quest to its opposing genre.
Celestial Koi Fish.passiveBonus: Once every 2 months, you may switch a genre quest to its opposing genre (passive).

Tome-Bound Cat.name: Tome-Bound Cat
Tome-Bound Cat.bonus: When you choose an Atmospheric Buff for your reading session, earn a x2 Ink Drop bonus on the effect.
Tome-Bound Cat.passiveBonus: Atmospheric Buffs grant +3 Ink Drops (passive, not multiplied).

Pocket Dragon.name: Pocket Dragon
Pocket Dragon.bonus: Earn a +20 Ink Drop bonus for books in a fantasy series.
Pocket Dragon.passiveBonus: Fantasy series books grant +10 Ink Drops (passive).

Garden Gnome.name: Garden Gnome
Garden Gnome.bonus: Earn +2 Ink Drops on any day where you read outside in nature or in a plant-filled room.
Garden Gnome.passiveBonus: Earn +1 Ink Drop for reading in nature or with plants (passive).

Mystical Moth.name: Mystical Moth
Mystical Moth.bonus: Earn +2 Ink Drops on nights when you read by lamplight.
Mystical Moth.passiveBonus: Earn +1 Ink Drop for reading by lamplight (passive).

Page Sprite.name: Page Sprite
Page Sprite.bonus: Earn a x2 Ink Drop bonus on any book under 300 pages.
Page Sprite.passiveBonus: Short books grant x1.5 Ink Drops (passive).

The Grand Key.name: The Grand Key
The Grand Key.bonus: You find a master key for a special, rare quest.

Crystal Sprite.name: Crystal Sprite
Crystal Sprite.bonus: Books with beautiful prose grant +15 Paper Scraps.

Reading Glasses.name: Reading Glasses
Reading Glasses.bonus: Dense or challenging texts grant +20 XP.

Baby Hollyphant.name: Baby Hollyphant
Baby Hollyphant.bonus: Books exploring faith, spirituality, or philosophical themes grant +15 XP and +5 Paper Scraps.

Coffee Elemental.name: Coffee Elemental
Coffee Elemental.bonus: Cozy reads or books enjoyed with a hot beverage grant +10 Ink Drops.

Lab Assistant Automaton.name: Lab Assistant Automaton
Lab Assistant Automaton.bonus: Books featuring robots, AI, or helpful technology grant +15 Ink Drops.

Temporal Sprite.name: Temporal Sprite
Temporal Sprite.bonus: Books with non-linear storytelling or time jumps grant +20 Ink Drops.

Ingredient Sprite.name: Ingredient Sprite
Ingredient Sprite.bonus: Books with interesting magical systems grant +15 Ink Drops.
Ingredient Sprite.passiveBonus: Magic system books grant +7 Ink Drops (passive).

Herb Dragon.name: Herb Dragon
Herb Dragon.bonus: Books with nature magic, plants, or green covers grant +15 Ink Drops.

Dancing Shoes.name: Dancing Shoes
Dancing Shoes.bonus: Romance or contemporary fiction with social gatherings grants +10 Ink Drops and +5 Paper Scraps.
Dancing Shoes.passiveBonus: Social scene books grant +5 Ink Drops (passive).

Dragon Fang.name: Dragon Fang
Dragon Fang.bonus: Books with dragons or legendary creatures grant +20 Ink Drops.
Dragon Fang.passiveBonus: Dragon or creature books grant +10 Ink Drops (passive).

Romance Reader's Ribbon.name: Romance Reader's Ribbon
Romance Reader's Ribbon.bonus: Romance or romantasy books grant +15 Ink Drops.

Star Navigator's Chart.name: Star Navigator's Chart
Star Navigator's Chart.bonus: Sci-fi books grant +15 Ink Drops (always active).

Fae-Touched Crystal.name: Fae-Touched Crystal
Fae-Touched Crystal.bonus: Fantasy with fae or nature magic grants +15 Ink Drops.
Fae-Touched Crystal.passiveBonus: Fae fantasy books grant +7 Ink Drops (passive).

Warding Candle.name: Warding Candle
Warding Candle.bonus: Horror or dark fantasy books grant +15 Ink Drops.

Literary Medallion.name: Literary Medallion
Literary Medallion.bonus: Classics or literary fiction grant +20 XP.

Golden Pen.name: Golden Pen
Golden Pen.bonus: Extensive journaling after a book grants +10 Paper Scraps.

Detective's Magnifying Glass.name: Detective's Magnifying Glass
Detective's Magnifying Glass.bonus: Mystery or crime books with puzzles grant +15 Ink Drops.

Raven Familiar.name: Raven Familiar
Raven Familiar.bonus: Once per month, remove one Worn Page penalty.
Raven Familiar.passiveBonus: Once every 2 months, remove one Worn Page penalty (passive).
